page.title: 17AXE WAREHOUSE HEATHFIELD
page.content: { { { { {Axe Warehouse}is situated on the{ {Heathfield Industrial Estate.}It supplies{18 different supermarkets} throughout{Cornwall,Devon and Dorset.} 12 people work there doing various jobs.600 different products are stored at the warehouse .The warehouse has a cold store where they keep butter and margarine etc.Nothing stays in the warehouse for over 3\ weeks. The cigarettes are kept locked up in a cage.They have 3 pallet trucks and 2 forklift trucks.All the boxes of goods have a date stamp on so they can use up the old stock first. The order and dispatching of stock and general running and organisation of the warehouse is controlled by a computer.
